customize-experience.checkbox-wait-label: We wait while you try - someWe wait while you try -  Contactless Delivery - We drop the items to your door  and the stylist will wait for your returns outside.
customize-experience.checkbox-assist-label: Assist me -  I would like to be assisted during the whole appointment by the stylist.
customize-experience.checkbox-basic-label: Basic Tailoring - I require Pinning and fitting.

contact-details.info-text: We will call or message you the day before, as well at the moment we’re arriving to ensure the quality of experience.

shopping-bag-container.instruction-1: This fee help us run our operations, all services included.
shopping-bag-container.instruction-2: Amount will be blocked on your card until the day of the delivery.

environment-header.env-header-h5-subhead: Carbon footprint is considered with every step of our service.

icon-img-text.text-h5: Over one-third of online fashion orders ends with a return, with two journeys for each: one to deliver and another to collect. This doubles the miles driven for each shop. With Emays, these delivery and return trips are combined, we cuts those miles in half by combining the delivery and return journey.

icon-text-img.text-h5: Emays delivery service is designed with the environment in mind  providing the best shopping experience for modern customers. We always strive for excellent customer service experience and take an intentional approach by reducing our environmental impact by delivering an all-inclusive store experience to your door with our zero-emission cars to make style more sustainable, for people and planet.

img-text-icon.text-h5: Emays delivers using packaging-free, hanging garments bags. This service aim to avoid the use of plastic and erase the disposable packaging.

text-img.text-h5: We partner with OneTreePlanted, and we support their projects. We plant one tree for every order that we complete, helping to clean the air that we breath, restore forests, create habitat for biodiversity, and make a positive social impact around the world.

col-1.title: WE SHIP THE SHOP
col-1.subtitle-h2: Take the luxury Shopping to experience your house
col-1.subtitle-h3: Try What you want, pay only what you keep.
col-1.btn-text: See what we can do for you

services.text-h1: Our Services are available on selected brands websites

first-block.body-text: Choose all the pieces you’d like to try, we’d bring them to you with no upfront payment.

second-block.body-text: Skip the process, we send back the pieces dont want.

third-block.body-text: Shop on your schedule with times available from 9am to 9pm, 7 days a week.

fourth-block.body-text: Carbon footprint is considered with every step of our service.
